title: Khaled New Album, Roscoe Hip Hop Opinion, Serena Retirement, Not In Nigeria and more.
itunes:title: Khaled New Album, Roscoe Hip Hop Opinion, Serena Retirement, Not In Nigeria and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride!  You get the formula today.  Blended family pettiness was a topic dealt with by The CLO.  DJ Khaled got another album.  Steve talks about the most important thing in life.  Roscoe Wallace shares his opinion about hip hop and reflects on the comments made by Fat Joe.  Olive Garden rewards fakers.  Nigeria makes a big change in policy.  This round of Would You Rather takes us to Vegas and Big Dog is happy.  Today in Closing Remarks, Steve talks about Jackson, MS and their water issue and the imbalance with the poor in this country.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
